name: servisofts-background-location
description: servisofts-background-location is a library for React Native Web.

scripts.up: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.start: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rsync -rv --exclude-from=./.copyignore ./ dist/ && tsc -p ./run.tsconfig.json
scripts.build: rm -rf dist  && mkdir dist  && rsync -rv --exclude-from=./.copyignore ./ dist/ && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json
